price: ߏ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߣߊ߬߸ ߡߐ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߞߎߡߊ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߬ߢߍ ߟߊ߫، ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߠߊ߲߬ߜߏ߫ ߸ ߘߏ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߠߊ߲߬ߘߌ߫
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفۡسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ شَقِيّٞ وَسَعِيدٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma yati lā takallamu nafsun illā bi-idh'nihi famin'hum shaqiyyun wasaʿīdun
